#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int z[1000005]={0},n,k;
int cnt[1000006]={0};
 string a;
void calcz()
{
//z[0]=n;
z[0]=0;
int l,r;
for(int i=1,l=0,r=0;i<n;++i)//calc z value for each i
{
//if for  i if we have previously calculated for use segment [l,r] to find its value .if(z[i-l]<r-i) use z[i]=z[i-l] else z[i]=r-i;
if(i<=r)
z[i]=min(z[i-l],r-i+1);
while(i+z[i]<n&&(a[i+z[i]]==a[z[i]]))
{
++z[i];
}
if(i+z[i]-1>r)
{
l=i;
r=i+z[i]-1;
}
}
}

int main()
{

    int i;
scanf("%d",&n);
cin>>a;
cin>>k;
calcz();
z[0]=n;
/*for(int i=0;i<=n;++i)
{
printf("%d ",z[i]);
}*/
/*for(i=0;i<=n;i++){
cnt[z[i]]++;
	}*/
	for( i=0;i<=n;++i)
{
cnt[z[i]]++;
}
int cur=0;
for(i=n;i>=0;i--)
{

cur+=cnt[i];
if(cur>=k)
{
break;
}
}
printf("%d\n",i);
for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
{
cout<<a[j];
}

return 0;
}
